title: Detox | Best in Gluten Free | Schär
description: Sigue nuestro consejo con la dieta detox para eliminar la acidez y depurar tu cuerpo y así compensar una alimentación inadecuada o en exceso.
cleaned_text: The detox is like a health farm holiday for your body - you'll feel reborn after a week. Your body disacidifies and purifies from the results of A week of Detox eating is sustainable. Even snacks are allowed. All you have to do is stop sugary drinks and acidifying foods such as coffee, cheese and milk. Our Detox recipes will help you plan your purifying week and your body to regain balance.
